body_html: Sorry that I'm still not following... Do these methods modify inplace (the trailing underscore means inplace methods)? Also index_add_ adds to the values at indices. It is not summing data at indices, right? What is the difference between the proposed index_mean_ and using index_select with mean?

body: Sorry that I'm still not following... Do these methods modify inplace (the trailing underscore means inplace methods)? Also `index_add_` adds to the values at indices. It is not summing data at indices, right? What is the difference between the proposed `index_mean_` and using `index_select` with `mean`?
